text: Anyone know how to prevent JavaScript files from being parsed by Hubl? I have tried `{% raw %}` //code here `{% endraw %}` which works inside a <script> tag in HTML/HUBL section, but not in the javascript-section of a module or in external javascript files? How do you solve that? I get `Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token '%'`
I think your best bet is to go with `<script>`  tags in the HTML/HUBL section.  You can Enqueue scripts as well
Yeah you can't use HubL in the javascript or CSS section of a module
